Review.Titre: Ordered a xim matrix and I shipped in 2…
Review.Contenu: Ordered a xim matrix and I shipped in 2 days but due to it being Sunday it was supposed to deliver on Monday, and I see a message saying insufficient address which has never ever happened to me while getting stuff delivered through usps, I contacted FBL email and they are trying to charge me to reship the item that I paid my hard earned money for. Definitely not recommending this horrible site to anyone. Terrible customer service aswell. And its a scam

Never received product, company waived it off as delivery issue.  Label creation issues for order throughout.  The agent I spoke to was nice and at least tried to be as helpful as the bureaucracy would allow him to.  That being said I still did not receive a single thing, nor a refund, nor any credit for the lack of delivery.

I reached out to Flashback to explain that I had a defected controller and was told that it was probably a setting that needed to be changed and to refer to the FAQ forum for further assistance. I went through all the forums and updated the controller and USB several times and still have the exact same problems. Gun autofires and will not stop until you have no ammo left. This is controller is trash. I want my money back.

Review.Titre: Why offer express shipping methods if…
Review.Contenu: Why offer express shipping methods if you can't keep those promises? I spent 10$ extra on shipping for 2-day delivery but it's been 3 and it's still not anywhere close to me. I ship things all the time and they get where they need to be. If that's a problem for your company don't ship USPS, use FedEx or UPS. I just bought the same thing on Amazon for the same price and shipping won't be a problem.Just checked at it says it will arrive a week after ordering even though I chose 2 day priority.

Review.Contenu: The nexus controller wasn’t working and the LT would just function without me pressing it down. I tried getting a refund but every time I open a link it says “server not found”. I don’t recommend this product.

Review.Titre: I ordered the xim apex on 28th on a…
Review.Contenu: I ordered the xim apex on 28th on a Thursday it was delivered on the 2 of march. My package was said to come at 2pm but never came. I was told by usps that my package was lost and can not be received. I followed up by calling usps and starting a claim. I was told my package was not covered by there insurance. Instead of flashback taking responsibility for my xim apex being missing and sending me another one. They have said and qoute "we are doing our own investigation into what happened with usps" ive emailed three times back and have yet to hear a response. Even tho usps has already closed my case.

Review.Contenu: I ordered an Xbox 360 controller and it didn't work. There was not a return label.  I asked for a return label to be mailed to me but said they wouldn't.  I have know way to print a return label.  I work everyday and they are usually closed but I have to get home to my special needs son.  No reason a return label can't be mailed to me. Now I'm stuck with a controller that doesn't work. I had to buy another one.   I'm an influencer and I'm not happy about your service. Thank you

Review.Contenu: The product didn’t even work as advertised, as well as flashback unlimited charging over $8 more than amazon does. Flashback Unlimited is a low budget scam that I DEFINITELY should have realized before ordering.

Review.Titre: Dongle fit loosely in NES console
Review.Contenu: Dongle fit loosely in NES console. I emailed the company and after several emails back and forth they blamed it on my console. Not the  case, my wired controllers work just fine.  The dongle holes are a different size from factory. They did offer me a refund but I have to pay for the shipping back. REALLY?  I’ll NEVER buy another product from Flashback.

Review.Titre: I spent $164.42 for one day shipment
Review.Contenu: I spent $164.42 for one day shipment. ( top priority) that is different than 2-3 business days. I am aware there is a pandemic going on which is why it would be understandable if I didnt pay for one day shipping. I paid for one day shipping for I can avoid getting my product later than expected. The one day shipping did not live up to expectations (guarantee one day shipping). It Is arriving later than expected. In that case it should follow under 2-3 days shipping instead of one. Once again, I paid $164.42 and it is not a fair act of service and didnt not live up to the date arrival. I was not given any updates, change of times, it said it would arrive on January 11, 2021, it is now January 12th therefore Marks as 2+ days   shipping. As I am still tracking my order I am aware and disappointed that I continue to as of now see change of dates arrival. It is only fair I recieve a refund for the one business day. It is now on day 2. Thos is what i sent them they steal your money and lie. These people are scams.

Well to be honest,  this might have been a good review if y'all wouldnt have taken so long to get my package shipped to me.  Then you have the guts to ask me for a review when I haven't recieved it yet?  This is bad.  I'm so angry and this was a Christmas gift.  Hopefully when it finally gets here,  I'll feel better but I'm angry that y'all would ask me for a review whenever I haven't received my beloved purchase yet!  I'd love to know what it's like of course but I havent recieved it yet!!  So thank you for rubbing it in.  Purchase was not on time.

Review.Titre: Failed to inform that their Mouse and…

Review.Titre: Worst Product on Market - MUST READ
Review.Contenu: I purchased this product for my son to use on his Xbox. It worked for a few days. When pulling the products out of the Xbox's USB the product fell completely apart.  The manufacturing was horrible.  Believe it or not, this is the great part of the story. I attempted to reach out to the manufacturer and recent less than no help.  The actually confirmed they seen this many times but deem this as "damaged" not a "defect".  Direct quote from customer service "We are not obligated to replace a damaged product, and we are not obligated to accept a return of your product if it was damaged by you." So, a polite go screw. Actual email thread from customer support:Hello, As I have stated, the product comes with a 1 year warranty. If you believe this is a defect, XIM Technologies can examine the product and determine if they agree. However, we have seen this issue happen a number of times. If the product is removed at an angle from the console, it can cause excess friction on the USB port and cause separation from the device. As this was damaged during use, we can not replace the product. Your credit card company may provide a 'damage warranty' (some CC companies do) and it may be worth investigating with them to see if that is the case. We are not obligated to replace a damaged product, and we are not obligated to accept a return of your product if it was damaged by you. We are sorry that your product got damaged. XIM Technologies does offer a repair service, and may be willing to do so a price that is far lower than the cost of a new item. Sincerely, Flashback Limited

Review.Titre: No device in package. Customer service don’t want solve it.
Review.Contenu: Very bad store. Fully unsatisfied. That’s my post on Reddit. Good day friends! I have a question and a warning. I would like to know if somebody came across such a situation and what to do. I bought xim apex on flashbackltd.com. I'm from Russia. ahead of the questions I will explain that we sell it at 30% more expensive, even taking into account the delivery. I made a choice in favor of this store. The delivery is very fast, but it is more the merit of postal services. I ordered this device for shooting a review in one of the Russian-speaking gaming communities. but before the detailed review there had to be a video about unpacking and the first impression, as well as a comparison with hori tac pro. This was done in order to publish this review in the xim user group and attach a referral link for further receiving small bonuses. I attach the link to the failed video. why did it fail? because there was no device inside. only hub however, he was in 2 packs (!). Perhaps this is done to correct the weight of the parcel. I will say in advance that at the customs in Russia and at the postal service they assured me that the parcel had not been opened, otherwise 2 acts would have been drawn up. I also checked the integrity of the outer packaging at the post office. I dropped the video to the support service, but a few days later they said that it was not their problem and they were fine. they refused to solve the problem in any way. They didn’t answer the question of shipping insurance. Actually the topic: 1. Is there an opportunity to complain to this site and return the money? what to do and where to write? 2. Never buy there. below the video. most likely you will not understand anything, but this is not necessary. without words everything is clear.You can look at video, search on YouTube xim apex Flashbackltd

Didnt get a tracking number paid 48 dollars for overnight shipping

Review.Titre: My Product does not work... even with professional help it would not pair to my PS4 controller and I do have the correct PS4 dualshock controller...
Review.Contenu: I bought a Cronus Zen back button for my PS4 controller because I already have the Cronus Zen device I thought this would be a plus which it still might be if I had a product that was functional and working! I have gone on every Cronus Zen website for better instructor even a FaceTime call with a collective Minds agent and we could not get the back button attachment to pair up with my Cronus Zen device. Now the Cronus is very fun to use I do use a scuf controller with it wanted to use a regular PS4 controller with these action buttons on the bottom where I am used to the paddles of a Scuf Controller but anyways I bought this in haste due to Black Friday sales I actually after I bought it found it $15 cheaper brand new on GameStop's website all in all I guess I'm saying you don't know what you get from this company apparently I believe they are all refurbished items or overstocked items but all in all my device does not work...
power supply received power, and failed to transmit power

I had a terrible experience ordering an internal cooling fan. When I received the fan, one of the wires was cut so it could not function. I emailed them letting them know It was very important to me to receive this fan before the weekend. Unfortunately they did not offer Saturday delivery. When I emailed to the Customer service representative, I was under the impression that they would ship a replacement part, even though I wouldn’t recieve it when I needed it, i still accepted that offer. A few days later I received  an email saying my money had been refunded. All in all, I received my fan about 3 weeks after I actually needed it. As someone who works in the e-commerce business, I was very disappointed with my experience here.

Review.Titre: Good shipping time, customer support. Needs better instructions.
Review.Contenu: The product arrived in a good time frame. The instructions online are not clear, I've had trouble getting it working. Customer support did answer my emails in a timely manner. They seem to be genuinely trying, which I appreciate. I would recommend a user's manual be included with the product, and videos be more detailed in explanation.

I took off one star because of the price, which doesn’t need to be over $100 for a usb hub and the XIM apex itself, it costs them $5-10 to make the equipment. I’m taking off another star because if you try to move completely horizontally to the right, the cursor will also move down as you move to the right. The opposite is done when you move to the left, the cursor moves up along with it. One more complaint I have is in the game Rainbow Six Siege. If you are sprinting forward and press Q or W, you will stop sprinting and walk forward in that direction. You are usually able to continue sprinting in a diagonal direction when doing this on both pc and Xbox.

Months ago I accidently messed up my PS4 controller shell. Looked around for a bit and found Flashback limited. The shell came quickly and nicely packaged. I do think shipping was a bit expensive at $6.30 for something so light and small, but it still was still cheaper than other places overall.The shell needed some posts removed and a slot filed into it for fitment, but that was disclosed and I am handy with things so it was no problem. It feels wonderful and well worth the money.

As if that wasn't enough, they got my product to me on the other side of the globe in record time. Flashback Limited is more than just a company selling products. I am very grateful. I would definitely use them again and also refer them to friends and family.
